page.title: 11A Day in a Child's Life
page.content: I go to school on a school bus. I catch the bus at 8.00 in the morning. When I get to school I have a time before assembly to play. In assembly we sing. After assembly we work. I do mathematics. Then the teacher says, "playtime" and we all go outside. We have one teacher. There are 22 children. Then we have our dinner. After dinner it is playtime. After playtime we do some painting, then we have a story then we go home on the school bus. When I get home I watch television. Then Mummy cooks my tea. Then I go to bed.
